input.sentences: family fun night with family and friends .
then the grownups had a surprise for the kids .
sparklers ! which the kids really enjoyed .
then a toast for a great night with great family and friends .
output.sentences: Finally it's Friday and time for a fun night with friends.
We really enjoyed playing games but Jenga is my favorite because I always win.
Since I thought this was a party for the grownups you can imagine my surprise when I saw kids walk in at 1:00 am.
Clearly the kids enjoyed taking advantage of drunk adults as they lit sparklers in the house.
My friends raised their glasses for a toast as I watched the kids make toast of another type with their sparklers, and I thought what a way to end the night.
